name: SimpleTap
signal_source: Senior usability research shows 'technology can often leave seniors feeling overwhelmed, excluded, and even anxious' with complex interfaces
description: Large-button utility app for common daily tasks designed specifically for older adults who struggle with complex interfaces
target_user: Older adults frustrated with small text and complicated menus who need simple tools for daily digital tasks
pain_point_evidence: Current apps feature 'illegible text, tiny targets' with 'complicated jargon' that may frustrate senior users
core_loop: Choose task from large, clear buttons
Save favorite actions for quick access
differentiation: Senior-first design vs. age-agnostic interfaces, prioritizes clarity over feature density
subscription_fit: Premium includes family sharing, advanced help features, and priority customer support

pricing.trial_strategy: Free basic functions, premium for family features and enhanced support
